content.text:
# Draft:Edward Skeletrix discography

| occupation        =
| discography       = Edward Skeletrix discography
| years_active      = 2013-present
| past_member_of    = 0% Boys, Mizustation
| website           =
}}Edward King Bass IV, known professionally as Edward Skeletrix, has released multiple recordings under various aliases since 2013. Bass began producing music under the name Cight in 2013, releasing two EPs and various singles. Since then, he has released music as ShieldLess and studio albums under the names Edward Skeletrix and Im a Monster.
